automenta.vivisect.surfaceplotter

Class ProgressiveSurfaceModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • automenta.vivisect.surfaceplotter.surface.AbstractSurfaceModel
      • automenta.vivisect.surfaceplotter.ProgressiveSurfaceModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SurfaceModel

    public class ProgressiveSurfaceModel
extends AbstractSurfaceModel
    ProgressiveSurfaceModel fills the surface with increasing "definition".

    It allocate an HD array , and start with a single face, then 4, then 16 etc. until reaching the goal HD definition.

    This defines the 

     def
    variable: def=0 means 1 face, def=1 means 4 faces etc.
